column5: There was mention on Q107 this morning that Markham may get an NHL team?  I highly doubt the info but was wondering if anyone else had heard anything.
The plan is to add a 19000 seat arena next to the rediculously huge mall they are building....its gonna be 10xs bigger than pacific mall
There is not very many people in Markham.  A few people and the rest of the houses are grow ops.
If you put a team in Markham.....then Would'nt Toronto want one then (Drumroll)
No need for another NHL team in Ontario.
the plan years ago was to move the leafs to Woodbine and 7 to make access to game easier but then came the ACC and Raptors.
York Region is the 4th fastest growing community in North America. You're looking at roughly 1 million people
The nickname "Buds" is already taken by the leafs...
They should bring a team to Quebec city and Winnipeg
It'd be a great rivalry between Markham and Toronto though. Markham would just be another team to blow them out of the water. Hey that's it, they could be the "Markham Leaf blowers"!
May make for a funny town sign though Roy---picture it  MARKHAM...home of the leaf blowers and weed eaters
